TransactionStateContext.DepositState: When users send Ether to the contract and the Deposit function is called.
WithdrawalState: When the owner calls WitdrawTokenToHolder to withdraw tokens on behalf of a holder.
When the owner calls WithdrawToHolder to withdraw Ether on behalf of a holder.

ExternalInteractions.TokenTransfer: Uses low-level call to transfer tokens between contract and holder address, which can fail silently.
ExternalInteractions.EtherTransfer: Uses low-level call to transfer Ether between contract and holder address, which can fail silently.
